ai-mil3.3.4:1.2_0: “Reverend Sir, there are other scorns who do not die.”
ai-mil3.3.4:1.5_0: “I am, great king, when there is the eye, sights, eye consciousness, and eye contact. When there is grasping, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness. When there is the origin of feeling, craving, grasping, and craving for continued existence. When there is rebirth, old age and death, there is the end of suffering.
ai-mil3.3.4:1.6_0: When there’s no eye, sights, eye consciousness, and eye contact don’t come to be. When there’s no eye contact, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness. When there’s no eye contact, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness don’t come to be. When there’s no grasping, craving doesn’t come to be.”
